title: My one gripe about this Poppy rework...
body: Is her VOs, judging from her VO you wouldn't guess she's a Noxian-hating badass whose parents were killed by Noxian assassins.

replies.body: You cant tell from Azir's voice that had had a pregnant wife and 2 kids who was murdered.
somehow that doesn't quite speak wife and 2 kids murdered.
That speaks to me of trying to wash yourself after a swim at the beach.
This is why Azir doesn't have a pool party skin, no one invites him because of all that sand.
would clog up the pool filters something chronic.
I doubt that's part of her lore anymore.
yeah they're bound to update her lore just like they're doing with other champs

he new lore is legit just "Poppy is roaming around trying so find someone worthy of the hammer, (Jarvan... hmm... looks worthy but nah...) little does she know, the hammer has already found its wielder"
Idk it seema pretty difficult to make any yordle look like a badass without giving him or her some huge ass machine to ride in

Tbh the two Yordles with machines look the least badass of them all, rumbles thing looks like its gunna fall apart any second from all the shaking around, and corki's thing looks so structurally unsound and his voice is the most irritating thing.
Super Galaxy Rumble doe? nah but I see your point and I think Kennen is the most badass looking one
are you kidding? Shes literally holding Mjolnir in her hands, you cant get more badass than that.
My gripe is that I'll have to learn some new champs now. I always used her when I had to jungle or top, and she was never taken or banned, so I never had to learn anyone else, haha
